title: The Big Bear tears apart the Lobster King
author: VD
content_html:
It’s actually an impressive rant. I almost, almost, wish I’d asked Owen Benjamin to write the Foreword to my forthcoming book, JORDANETICS: A Journey Into the Mind of Humanity’s Greatest Thinker.

Almost. But not quite. You’ll see why.
content_text:
It’s actually
an impressive rant
. I almost,
almost
, wish I’d asked Owen Benjamin to write the Foreword to my forthcoming book,
JORDANETICS: A Journey Into the Mind of Humanity’s Greatest Thinker.
Almost. But not quite. You’ll see why.
